title: Caribbean jerk stew with beans & coconut

ingredients.item: 1 tbsp Filippo Berio Mild & Light Olive Oil
227g can essential Waitrose Pineapple Slices in Fruit Juice, drained and cut into chunks

instructions.step: Heat the oil in a frying pan and fry the squash for 5 minutes. Add the beans, jerk seasoning, pineapple and tomatoes, and cook for 3-4 minutes.
Stir in the coconut cream, cover and cook for 5 minutes. Add the parsley and serve with rice (optional).
